channel.title: [317]everywhere is wild...?![317]
channel.description:
ok so when i log into my server,every where is wild and it has the skull thing with the wild level when im not in the wild.
please tell me how to fix it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 10:48:09 pm[/size][hr]btw if this isnt enough info i can give more

item.title: [317]everywhere is wild...?![317]
item.dc:creator: @lilwermscape_ftw lilwermscape_ftw
item.description:
@lilwermscape_ftw wrote:

I typed this up a while back… could be useful…

imagine the place u want to make a safe zone as a box. go to where u want the southwest corner of the box to be. Write down your x and y coordinates on a piece of paper as:
SW X = ####.
SW y = ####.
(just to keep you organised.)

Go to where u want the Northeast corner to be.
(Do the same as above but instead write down:
NE x = ####
NE y = ####)

Now you have your SW and NE coordinates.

Now look at your code:

if ((absX >= SW x coord && absX <= NE x coord && absY >= SW y coord && absY <= NE y coord && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1))

Just put in the coords as shown in my above code:
SW x coord = Southwest X coordiante
SW y coord = Southwest Y coordinate
NE x coord = Northeat X coordinate
NE y coord = North east Y coordinate

i dont know if ur a new coder or not and if what i just said means anything to you… but thats about as simple as i can put it.

i really hoped that this helped you out.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]everywhere is wild...?![317]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

IceTICKER:

Make, a safe zone.

Tell him how to… He says tell him how to…

Just add some coords in public boolean nonwild, once you see it its self explanatory… You have to make it like a box:
NE
_______
| |
| |
| |
|______|

                                          SW
